Sep 19

Fintech Hackathon

08:00 • The Wave, 4 Hing Yip Street, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

Hosted by Finnovasia • RSVP • Get Directions

FINTECH HACKATHON

Deloitte Digital invites you to join developers, designers and entrepreneurs for a two-day contest on prototyping real-life FinTech solutions for Millennials

Seats are limited. The deadline for submitting application is Sep 12

For two days, be amongst 70 of the brightest minds that are re-imaging finance for the future generations. You will join a team composed of designers, technologists and financers. Have the chance to refine your idea with industry expert’s serving as mentors. Test your product with a representative sample of students. Finally, pitch the solution to financial executives and venture capitalists serving as judges.

(More information here.](https://fthackathon.com/)
